Breadth-First.Explanation: Introductory planning with no specific hypothesis, preparing to gather clues
Divergent observation, listing all visible elements without narrowing
Selecting and summarizing important clues but not yet forming a specific hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Based on key clues, derives and narrows to a specific location hypothesis (Dublin and candidate sites)
Depth-First.KeyElement: Hypothesis: Dublin; Candidate sites: Trinity College, Custom House, Four Courts

Depth-First.Explanation: Focuses on verifying the hypothesis by seeking specific bus route information
Depth-First.KeyElement: Dublin bus route 40 and Charlestown details

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from broad clue summarization to formulating and verifying a specific location hypothesis
